New Records: Shubman Gill, the star batsman for Team India, is set to miss the IND vs AFG match due to dengue, marking a significant absence for the team as he is a key player in their lineup
Key Match Events: The absence of Shubman Gill means Ishan Kishan will likely replace him, and his performance in the previous match against Australia was noted but not impactful
Pre-Game Insights: Team India secured a win against Australia, setting a positive tone for the World Cup, but the absence of Shubman Gill adds pressure on the team's preparation for the next match against Afghanistan
